title: Мир забесплатно
overview: It's time to "blow up" the tourist system! Vasya and Sasha will show how to turn even the most budget-friendly trip into a vacation full of impressions. Every week, the hosts of "World for Free" go to one of the most famous and expensive tourist cities to get maximum pleasure for minimum expenses. They will tell you how to save money on your trip, teach you not to succumb to popular tourist tricks, and even show you how to make money on vacation!
